title: UCID: Urban Context Identifier
description: UCID (Urban Context Identifier) is a standardized, temporal identifier system and Python library for comprehensive urban context analysis. Version 1.0.5 supports 405 cities across 23 countries with production-ready context algorithms. The library provides a universal key for joining disparate urban datasets, enabling cross-city comparisons and longitudinal studies of urban quality of life metrics.
notes:
UCID v1.0.5 Key Features:

- 405 cities across 23 countries
- Production contexts: 15MIN, TRANSIT, WALK, NONE
- Performance: CREATE 127,575 ops/sec, PARSE 61,443 ops/sec
- H3 hexagonal spatial indexing (resolution 9 default)
- ISO week temporal stamps
- Grade scale: A (>=0.80), B (>=0.60), C (>=0.40), D (>=0.20), F (<0.20)
- Confidence scores 0.0-1.0
- Full type hints and Python 3.11+ support
references: Moreno, C. et al. (2021). Introducing the 15-Minute City. Journal of Urban Health.
Uber Technologies. (2018). H3: A Hexagonal Hierarchical Geospatial Indexing System.
GTFS. General Transit Feed Specification. https://gtfs.org/
